mapper.select: select x.member_id, x.email, x.name, x.phone, x.status, x.avatar, x.company from member x where x.member_id not in ( select a.member_id from member a, team_member b where a.member_id = b.member_id and b.team_id = #{teamId} ) and x.name like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
mapper.delete: delete from team_member where member_id = ${memberId} and team_id =#{teamId}
mapper.select: select a.team_id, b.name, b.host from team_member a, team b where a.team_id = b. team_id and a.member_id =#{memberId} and a.include = 'Y'
